title: Did a man from Oklahoma save a dog who was chained to a cage in the woods?
subtitle: Two stories of dogs found in the forest were compiled by a website of viral content in search of a more dramatic story.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A man walking his dogs in the woods in a broken arrow, Oklahoma, found a cage with a heavy chain and saw what he thought was a beaver. It turns out he's a dog.
